meanings.definition: To defeat or surpass in a pitching competition.
meanings.sent1: She outpitched all her opponents in the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: The pitcher outpitched his rival with ease.
meanings.sent3: The young pitcher outpitched the veteran player, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outpitch her own record was evident in every throw.
meanings.sent5: The underdog team outpitched the champions, shocking the crowd.

meanings.definition: To outperform or outdo in pitching.
meanings.sent1: He outpitched his previous best performance in today's game.
meanings.sent2: The new pitcher outpitched the experienced player in the match.
meanings.sent3: The robot pitcher outpitched all human players, causing laughter among the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for the game outpitched any doubts about her skills.
meanings.sent5: The young talent outpitched all expectations, leaving the coach impressed.
